Name: My city and army
About the game: 'My city and the army' is a new generation of hard core games including urban construction, simulation management, war strategy and other elements. From the primitive village of rumaoyinxue, after development and prosperity, colonization and expansion, it finally unified the country and achieved a huge empire. As the decision-maker of the Empire, you are expected to lead your subjects to achieve immortality and hegemony along the steps of faith, or gradually disappear in the endless river of history. First of all, the game has a level playing method. Players need to start from level 1 and complete the task before they can go up to the next level, directly to the full level. The second is that Construction: players can choose the buildings that have been developed and constructed to build. The construction conditions may require some resources to build. In agriculture, players can cultivate rice, wheat, flax, mulberry leaves, tree lacquer, etc. to obtain food and raw materials. Industry, players can build industrial buildings, industrial buildings can produce porcelain, lacquerware, bronze, textile, paper, jade and other living utensils. In military, players can train soldiers of different arms, plunder players' resources and attack other cities on the world map.
